overview: Since Archie got into the MenPop app, he's been trying to get a rise out of his roommates with wilder and wilder hijinks. Although his "drop the towel challenge" doesn't get a big reaction from Joey Mills and Michael Boston as they play videogames, when he jizzes all over their pizza they definitely take notice. Joey checks out Archie's profile to take his revenge, then hides in his room to give him a "surprise facial" just like Archie wanted.
title: Men Pop
